resources.string: Tap on the map to add a silent zone
No zones saved yet.\nTap on the map to add a zone.
ZoneSilent needs location permission to detect when you enter or exit designated silent zones.

ZoneSilent requires background location permission to automatically silence your phone when you enter designated zones, even when the app is not actively open.

This is essential for the app's core functionality. Please select 'Allow all the time' in the next screen.

Your location data is only used locally on your device to trigger silent zones and is never shared or uploaded anywhere.
ZoneSilent needs permission to modify Do Not Disturb settings to automatically silence your phone in designated zones.
